values:
i wish i knew why i just can't get out of this funk... i know part of it is that im a fat cow.. i wont even say my weight....  i dont like looking in the mirror when i get out of the shower.. my hubby says im beautiful but i dont feel beautiful.

i guess on a good note it has been several days since i cut!  i will just dream of being back in florida with the hubby.. haven't felt that happy in a while.  lately it has been hard to smile...
peace and hugs everyone..

Sometimes I really feel like my life is out of control.  I have been getting frustrated easily but the load of stress right now is huge.  My hubby can handle it (or hide it) better than I can.  We have been bitching at each other off and on for days and it's about the same thing.  Some of the things he has said to me have been so cruel.  Later he will tell me that he's sorry and lost his temper.  But ya before that found myself slicing my upper thigh.  Looks like crap.  I have done it 3 times in the past few days.  i wish that things could be like it was a month ago.

OMG i just did the bmi calculator measured everyting.....this is the fattest I have ever been.  
ugh please help me.. i need to  shed 40 lbs LOL omg...
i have to do something before i loose it

Loser lyrics

Breathe in right away,
Nothing seems to fill this place
I need this every time,
Take your lies get off my case
Someday I will find a love
That flows through me like this
This will fall away,
this will fall away
You’re getting closer to pushing me
Off of life’s little edge
Cause I’m a loser
And sooner or later
You know I’ll be dead
You’re getting closer,
You’re holding the rope,
I'm taking the fall
Cause I’m a loser, I’m a loser, yeah
This is getting old,
I can’t break these chains that I hold
My body’s growing cold,
There’s nothin left of this mind
Or my soul
Addiction needs a pacifier,
The buzz of this poison is taking me higher
This will fall away,
This will fall away
You’re getting closer, to pushing me
Off of life’s little edge
Cause I’m a loser and sooner or later
You know I’ll be dead
You’re getting closer,
You’re holding the rope and
I’m taking the fall
Cause I’m a loser
You’re getting closer, to pushing me
Off of life’s little edge
Cause I’m a loser and sooner or later
You know I’ll be dead
You’re getting closer,
You’re holding the rope
And I’m taking the fall
Cause I’m a loser

Ya the other day I totally lost it... too stressfull to go into details.. i dont want to trigger myself AGAIN. but i cut and i didnt care where usually iam picky but this time i was way out of control. bled all over had to cover it up didint want my son to see it. i am suc a failure.... i think it is because i can't loose weight. found out im diabetic... there goes my bulmia...  if i go ana i will surely die... but im not happy fat!!! shit
someone help me!!

Right now i hate myself and my life.  my husband broke a promise to me and it was a big one.  i am numb... andd yes i cut.. not too bad i guess... i cleaned up the mess .... if it wasn't for having my son (15) i would not be on this earth anymore im tired of being lied to..  im just shit.  a nobody... i dont deserve happiness.

Ok I know that looks fucked up.  My life has been hell.  It is a load of crap when people say don't worry honey things will get better.  ARE THEY FUCKING CRAZY!!!  Well shit it has been 2 damn long years and it has only gotten worse.  I just buried the man I had started dating.  He was a cop and was murdered.  Ya I know in my earlier posts my ex and i were trying to get back together but after a yr ish of counseling he told me he didnt love me enough to try.  Mind u we were married 13 years.  How fucking nice.
I hate my life.  I  have to go.  i need to cut.

I just so want to go into a corner and cry.  I feel so lost and that I will never have happiness again.  Why did I throw it all away.  How stupid am I.  Grass is not always greener.

There are not enough pills to make me feel better.  Shit Im on 3 different kinds and I still feel like shit.  I feel like I am just barly on the edge.  One little push and wham!  God I just want to be happy again. Please...

Why are people such assholes... this guy i used to date just called my work being a dick because i havent called him etc.  well duh im not his grilfriend anymore... he was always so jealous it pissed me off.  And he made nasty comments about my son.  People can say shit about me but when it comes to my son no way.  I wont take that crap.  Ugh immature dick.  Im so fucking pissed that this guy called me at my work. 

gggggggggrrrrrrrrrr

Ahhh yes the start of another week.  I hope this week will be better.  I have my son this week so I wont be as lonely.  I am so hoping things work out ok for me and my ex.  It is so hard on my son. He wants us back together but sometimes we fight and we really try not to do that in front of him.  but there have been a couple of times when i was hiding in my room crying from him yelling at me that my son found me.  i try not to make a big deal of it.  i dont want to turn my son against his dad.  besides i still love him.  ugh... why does life have to be so hard....

~ hugs

gen

Hey all!  Another day passed.  I made it.  I pray that someday things will be back to normal.  But then what is normal?  Have I ever really known normal?  Who decides what is normal?

I medicate to be what people say is normal.  Sometimes I wish life had a hanbook.  I know that there are people worse off than me and i feel desperatly bad for them. 

I wish i could just close my eyes and go to sleep and not wake up somtimes.  but then i dont want to leave my son. he is the world to me.

*sigh*

so i continue on...
god i wish i could go back and fix things... but i cant and karma is coming back to get me
Well let's see how today goes.... all ready im hungry.... shit... must drink lots of water....

DAMMIT I so bigned.. i picked up my son from school and he was hungry so we picked up some breadsticks I ate a bunch.. got rid of some of it.. like everything else i suck at that too.. ggrr i need to loos weight... help
So far a good day!!! I have gotten rid of most of the 3 apples and pb i ate this am. Felt sooo good to get rid of it. I felt gross after I ate it. I will make my gw...
I can win the battle .... I will be thin...

Well im sorta proud of myself a friend of mine came over and offered to bring me Arbys and I said no!!!  Instead I ate about 5 doritos and 2 apples.  After he left I did my yoga routine.  I feel so great today.  Have my big jug of green tea... I can do this...

Just got back from lunch... I binged on some buffalo wings... got rid of them tho...   I look so fat I just cant take it.  My hips are just sooo huge... Time to hit the tread mill at the apt. tonight... go till i drop..
Do we really know who we are inside???

Well went to the doc's boy was that so ever fun.  I think this is the first time I just broke down.  I couldn't stop crying.  He probably thinks Im nuts.  Oh wait I am.  He upped the dose of the Lexapro that Im taking. Shit Im on so many things the pharmacy gives me a frequent flyer card.
Ya know what really sucks is that I feel so overweight... I tried to mia yesterday and jeez i suck at that.  I couldn't get it to work.  Talk about feeling like a failure.

It seems like everything I do just turns to crap.

well i have a dr appt today whats weird i didnt know i had an appt.  i called to get a shrinks mumber and the girl said you can get it when you come in for your appt.  I swear it's like G-d knows that i am at the end of my rope and need help.

Is running away just for teenagers or can we as adults choose to run away.  My life has changed so much in the past year.  I left my husband for a stupid reason destroyed my life and now i have been so depressed I can't see straight.  I cry everyday so much so that my eyes are swollen.  Im on 3 different medications to keep me from going off the deep end and it is not working.  
I have no one to talk to and this is the only way to get my feelings out.  I feel i have no control over my life.

Im sooo depressed im gaining weight.  I think that is the only thing that i do have control over.  Cant keep anything down lately. I think it's stress.
